data.actual_result: Your device crashes when u try to "select all" on the special unicode characters
data.expected_result: You should be able to copy and paste the special unicodes without crashing
data.short_description: Selecting a specific username with special unicodes makes your device crash. [iPhone 6/6s/7 plus - iOS 11.4 & iPad Air 2 iOS 11.4/11.3.1 only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy and paste this in a channel 𐌂ⓗ𐌆Ṇ ¢Ħคη𝔤 - Click on the text till you see “copy text” - Click on “copy text”- Paste it in your chat bar- Long press your chat bar till you see “select all”- Click select all button and observe the crash
